short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for managing SQLite databases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SQLite Manager Chrome Extension
SQLite Manager is a Chrome extension that allows users to manage SQLite databases directly in the browser. It provides a user-friendly interface for creating, editing, and querying SQLite databases without the need for external software.

Features
Create new SQLite databases
Import existing SQLite databases
Create and manage tables
Add, edit, and delete table data
Execute custom SQL queries
Export databases
